creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
description: sketchy image of sailboats on choppy water under grey and blue clouds; pink, blue and grey sheets of rain
markings: on backing board: Galerie Beyeler label
medium: Black chalk and watercolor on graph paper
provenance: [Galerie du Ponts des Arts, Paris, July 12, 1964]; [Galerie Beyeler, Basel, Switzerland, inventory number 4156]; [James Goodwin Gallery, Buffalo, Dec. 1, 1965. [Jerrold Morris International Gallery, Ltd., Toronto, 1965; sold to Butler]; Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Butler, St. Paul (1965-d. 1993); Sandra and Peter Butler, St. Paul (1993-2011; given to Mia)
signed: No signature visible on recto; possibly inscribed [BO] at right.
